item.title: Why I choose to go against using WordPress Multisite?
item.description: When you start out with the WordPress, it’s common to assume that each blog needs a separate WordPress installation. But there’s a simpler way. WordPress Multisite installation. This lets one have different blogs with just one installation of WordPress. But, why did I choose not to use it? item.title: How To Remove The /blog/ slug From The Permalinks(URL) Without A Plugin
item.description: What is a blog slug? If you have no clue, this post isn’t for you and if you want to know what it is, it is an ugly looking additional “/blog/” in the permalinks (URLs) in your website that comes free with the multisite feature in WordPress. Why ugly? Because it comes uninvited, it’s there and most probably you don’t want it. How do you remove the additional “blog” in the URL of your posts?
